title: Loving Hut - Reynoldsburg
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Chinese, Take-out, Asian, Vietnamese
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Serves all vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and dessert. Each location is individual family owned. Sample items include panini with tofurkey slices, cole slaw, banana peppers on grilled sourdough bread.
